column5: I was at radio world to pick up a chip today and saw some inflatable PFDs on sale.  $80 for manual and $118 for auto.  Revere brand.  They had quite a few there minus the 2 I bought for gifts.
If you buy one I suggest the auto. If you are ejected and unconscous the auto will save your life.
I were my Auto inflate all day everyday. My latch cord is permanently attached so it forces me to use it.
Does it get uncomfortable at work?  :-)
